images.caption: Figure 1:Evaluation pipeline: (1) We collect example texts for all 22 languages. (2) We send the example texts to the LLMsâ€™ tokenizer. (3) Evaluate the tokenized outputs. (4) We construct leaderboards using our evaluation.
